sentence.Network_en: Make authorship your avocation, not your vocation.
sentence.Network_cn: 把写作当作你的副业, 不要把它当作正业.

sentence.Network_en: He was a printer by trade and naturalist by avocation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从事印刷业，同时是个博物学爱好者。

sentence.Network_en: He is a doctor by profession and a novelist by avocation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的职业是医生,副业是作家.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... avid adj. 渴望的,热心的 avocation n. 副业,嗜好 avow v. 承认,公开宣称.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... avocation 嗜好 avocation 业余爱好 avoid 回避.
...【翻译】约翰是个热心的邮票收藏家，只要有人提起集邮，他就会滔滔不绝。avocation副业，嗜好【记】a不+vocation不是职业→副业；来自vocal职业是内心的呼唤.

list.abs: ...鸣走跃蛛（学名：Sitticus avocator）为跳蛛科跃蛛属的动物。分布于印度、俄罗斯、日本以及中国大陆的新疆等地。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Sitticus av.
my greatest avocation is musing . I can stay by myself for a long time without disconsolate in the least .我的最大爱好是深思默想。我可以一个人长时间地独处而感到愉快。
Learning ballet is just an avocation with me ., 学习芭蕾舞只不过是我的一项业余爱好.
Learning foreign languages is just an avocation with me ., 学外语是我的一项爱好.
lasher bridge presses down a government to put forward : make full use of existing surface , expand avocation production .1983年，堰桥镇政府提出：充分利用现有水面，发展副业生产。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin avocatio(n-), from avocare 'call away', from ab- 'from' + vocare 'to call'

entry.def: Your avocation is a job or activity that you do because you are interested in it, rather than to earn your living.

example.ex: He was a printer by trade and naturalist by avocation.
example.tran: 他从事印刷业，同时是个博物学爱好者。

auth_sentence.content: Yet Prada insists that her vocation and her avocation are unrelated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet Prada insists that her vocation and her avocation are unrelated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet Prada insists that her vocation and her avocation are unrelated.

auth_sentence.content: Journalism as a profession will share the stage with journalism as an avocation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Journalism as a profession will share the stage with journalism as an avocation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Journalism as a profession will share the stage with journalism as an avocation.

auth_sentence.content: Try, by every method of avocation and amusement, whether you cannot...get the better of that dejection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Try, by every method of avocation and amusement, whether you cannot...get the better of that dejection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Try, by every method of avocation and amusement, whether you cannot...get the better of that dejection.

stems_affixes.word_buile: equi平等+vocal[adj.声音的;有声的;歌唱的]→两种声音的,听不清楚的→意义含糊的
ir不+revocable可取消的→adj.不可取消的
voci=voc出声,叫喊,看+fer带来+ous……的→带来声音的→喧闹的
advocate拥护+or人→n.拥护者, 提倡者
voc出声,叫喊,看+able能……的→能发出声的→词
vocabul=vocable[n.[无义]词, 词外壳]+ary表名词→n.词汇,词汇量;词汇表
voc出声,叫喊,看+al表名词→n.元音;声乐作品
vocal[adj.声音的;有声的;歌唱的]+ist人→n.流行歌手,声乐家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 职业;召唤;天命;天职;才能
stems_affixes.word_buile: voc出声,叫喊,看+ation表名词→[受到]召唤→天职;职业
vow=voc出声,叫喊,看+el表名词→n.元音；元音字母
con共同+voc出声,叫喊,看+ation表名词→n.召集,会议
ad加强+voc出声,叫喊,看+ate表动词→增强声音→拥护
equi平等+voc出声,叫喊,看+ate表动词→两种声音听不清楚→支吾其词

sentences.en: Make authorship your avocation, not your vocation.
sentences.cn: 把写作当作你的副业，不要把它当作正业。
